alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 2:05PM AKST until March 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Northwest winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and low visibility in blowing snow are expected to develop this evening at Deering and Buckland, and to continue into Thursday. Winds will slowly decrease Thursday afternoon and conditions will slowly improve then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
